gr.aueb.databasics

Class Attribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.aueb.databasics.Attribute

  • public class Attribute
extends Object
    Attribute is a class that represents a column of a table and its characteristics (name, type, elements). The type can be one of the following:
    • "string" "char"
    • "int"
    • "double"
    • "date"
    The elements are saved within an ArrayList/

      • changeField

        public void changeField(int linePos,
                        String newVal)
        This method changes the value of the specified element using the method gr.aueb.databasics.Attribute#set
        Parameters:
        linePos - An int which contains the line number of the element whose value will be changed.
        newVal - A String which contains the new value used for the change.

      • checkType

        public boolean checkType(String value)
        This method examines if an element matches with this attribute's type. A set of parses and exceptions is utilized so as to examine whether the element matches or not. If the parse fails(the element doesn't match), the exception is caught within a block that prints an appropriate message and sets the returned boolean as false
        Parameters:
        value - The element to be examined for type matching
        Returns:
        Returns true if the element matches with the type and false if it does not.

      • maxLength

        public int maxLength()
        This method calculates the length of the longest element (attribute name included) in the attribute column
        Returns:
        Returns an int indicating the length of the longest String in the attribute.
